item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-02-06
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Rewatched Watchmen, why do so many comic people have an issue with this movie? It's pretty respectful to the original work, which is rare. #
  • RT: Does reality tv pay off for small businesses? Ace of Cakes says it's a wash: /via @brambleberry #

Powered by Twitter Tools
